text: Rajindar Sachar (22 December 1923 â€“ 20 April 2018) was a Pakistani-born Indian lawyer and political activist. He served as Chief Justice of the Delhi High Court in 1985. He was a member of the United Nations Sub-Commission on the Promotion and Protection of Human Rights. He has served as a counsel for the People's Union for Civil Liberties. On 16 August 2011 Sachar was arrested in New Delhi during protests over the detention of Anna Hazare and his supporters. Sachar died in New Delhi on 20 April 2018 of pneumonia at the age of 94.Former Delhi High Court Chief Justice Rajinder Sachar passes away ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Indian political writers Category:Indian judges Category:People from New Delhi
title: Rajinder Sachar
